scripts.build:test: tsc --project tsconfig.json && mkdir -p dist && cp index.js dist/index.js
scripts.test: npm run test-nodejs && npm run test-browser
scripts.test-nodejs: npm run build:test && node --require ./node-header.cjs node_modules/tape/bin/tape dist/tests/*.js -cov
scripts.test-browser: npm run build:test && browserify dist/tests/*.js -p esmify | npx tape-run
scripts.test-browser:ci: npm run build:test && browserify dist/tests/*.js -p esmify | tape-run --browser electron --electron-arg=--no-sandbox --electron-arg=--disable-gpu
